headline: An Outcry at Harvard After a Latina Professor Is Denied Tenure
abstract: Some students of color say that even as the university defends its use of race in admissions, it devalues their experiences and fails to retain professors who support them.
lead_paragraph: CAMBRIDGE, Mass. â€” The news spread quickly, angering Latino students and others at Harvard: One of the few professors who specialized in Latino and Caribbean studies and devoted time to mentoring students of color had been denied tenure.
